creator: Richard_Schoenig@picis.com
text:
[Mon Jun 04 16:28:35 2007] [crit] [Mon Jun 04 16:28:35 2007] file D:\\asf-
build\\build-2.0.59\\server\\mpm\\winnt\\child.c, line 1078, assertion "(rv >= 
0) && (rv < threads_created)" failed

When an apache -k restart is run we are getting this error.  Also the server is 
not restarting the child process on its own like it used to.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11997 ***
creator: davi@apache.org
